Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

clonotypr 0.4.0.9000 - 2020-03-30

Added

  • AnalyzeGenes function for pulling vdj gene info and calculating frequency + categorizing basic cell types (for plotting)
  • PlotVDJBySegment – Plots histogram of all genes in a given T-Cell/B-Cell chain/isotype for a given VDJ-gene (i.e “TRAV”, “IGKJ”)
  • PlotVDJStatus – Plots cell counts for the presence versus absence of a given VDJ gene
  • PlotVDJByNetwork – Plots sankey diagram or chord diagram based on the network analysis done by BuildVDJNetwork
  • BuildVDJNetwork – Network analysis for VDJ genes across the sample. Returns an edge list, node list, and full list of connections between VDJ genes

Changes

  • AddClonotypes and LoadClonotypes now has improved regex for pulling data files containing “clonotypes.csv” and “filtered_contig_annotations”
  • MakeFrequencyDF refactored to optimize time complexity – massive reduction in runtime (>99% runtime reduction)
  • MakeFrequencyDF takes additional param barcodes which builds the same dataframe as GetBarcodeFreqs
  • MakeBarcodeDF and GetBarcodeFreqs have deprecation warning (intended update == v1.0.0)

clonotypr 0.3.2 - 2020-03-16

Bug Fixes

  • PlotCDR3aa no longer throws error with length param set to numeric (ex. PlotCDR3aa(data, length=15, alpha=TRUE))

Changes

  • Improved default ggplot appearance for PlotPFM, PlotPPM, and PlotPWM

clonotypr 0.3.1 - 2020-03-15

Bug Fixes

  • Patch for BuildPFM (and the family of Build/PlotP_M): fixed error thrown when data != Seurat or length-table
  • Patch for PlotCDR3aa and PlotLengths: fixed error thrown when data != Seurat or length-table

Changes

  • Edited text for DescribeClonotypes to reflect “clonotypes”
  • pbmc_vdj now contains the vdj-gene information added in last update (v0.3.0)
  • BuildSummary re-integrates vdj-gene/cdr3s_nt info back into the output table

clonotypr 0.3.0 - 2020-03-12

Added

  • Two functions for plotting clonotype frequencies: PlotFrequencyDist and PlotTopClonotypes

Changes

  • LoadClonotypes and AddClonotypes now incorporate v_gene, d_gene, j_gene, c_gene, and cdr3_nt into dataframe

clonotypr 0.2.1 - 2020-03-01

Bug Fixes

  • Patch for several functions not accepting data from LoadClonotypes

clonotypr 0.2.0 - 2020-02-29

Added

  • Alternative to working with Seurat objects, LoadClonotypes returns a new dataframe
  • Set of functions for plotting position matrix heatmaps, PlotPFM, PlotPPM, and PlotPWM. Each formats the heatmaps based on the type of matrix

Changes

  • Export BuildPFM, BuildPPM, and BuildPWM, shorthand functions offfering the same return as AnalyzeCDR3aa

Contents
